execution_plan.description: Count orders placed in the last 7 days in the EU sales database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EU' AS region, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders WHERE updated_at >= now() - INTERVAL '7 days';

execution_plan.description: Count orders placed in the last 7 days in the US sales database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'US' AS region, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders WHERE updated_at >= now() - INTERVAL '7 days';
